The Corner Bistro

A busy 24/7 diner that serves the finest pre and post hangover meals including all day breakfast. It´s owned and operated by Dora Bess, an old therian woman with a large family and grandmother to the Leader of Everlight´s Pack.

Frozen

A nightclub owned by Johnny Rose. It caters to townies and vacationers alike featuring sexy pole dancers, half naked servers, private rooms and public 'orgy' rooms. The club is a 'known' vampire den.

The Jade Dragon

A casino owned by the Wei family of Vegas. The Jade Dragon in Everlight is operated by the youngest son Benjamin Wei and may or may not have a tie to the Sanguine Masquerade.
